name: io.bytes.per.checksum
description:
The number of bytes per checksum.  Must not be larger than
  io.file.buffer.size.

name: hadoop.http.cross-origin.max-age
description:
The number of seconds a pre-flighted request can be cached
    for web services needing cross-origin (CORS) support.

name: ha.failover-controller.graceful-fence.rpc-timeout.ms
description: Timeout that the FC waits for the old active to go to standby

name: mapreduce.task.io.sort.mb
description:
The total amount of buffer memory to use while sorting
  files, in megabytes.  By default, gives each merge stream 1MB, which
  should minimize seeks.

name: dfs.mover.moverThreads
description: Configure the balancer's mover thread pool size.

name: dfs.namenode.checkpoint.max-retries
description:
The SecondaryNameNode retries failed checkpointing. If the 
  failure occurs while loading fsimage or replaying edits, the number of
  retries is limited by this variable.

name: dfs.datanode.handler.count
description: The number of server threads for the datanode.
